Kathleen M.5.0 out of 5 starsFantastic Book!!!Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2014Verified Purchase  My son had a slight communication delay, and his speech therapist was concerned about him picking up body language and emotional cues from facial expressions.  I saw this book and thought it would give me the perfect opportunity to really exaggerate the facial expressions to help him learn the emotions.  Little did I know how much he would love this book, it is always the one he chooses when I ask which book he wants to read for bedtime!!  Since there isn't a lot of text, you can really "act out" each emotion.  Every time I do an "emotion" my son (who is just over 2yrs old) giggles and repeats it.
